channel.title: c++ on Hello, I'm Mark

item.title: Raycasting
item.description: Becoming a Coding Train Fanboy Â¶ Lately I’ve been binging a lot of YouTube again and for a while now I’ve been recommended The Coding Train videos, but I’ve never cared enough to open one of his 40min videos, until a week ago when I discovered how great his coding projects are. Upon watching the introduction of one of his approximating Pi videos I decided it would be fun to try and code the program, before watching the video.
